name: Diluc
title: Dark Side of Dawn
description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

normalattack.name: Tempered Sword
normalattack.description: Perform four consecutive strikes. When charged, performs continuous slashes ending in a powerful strike.

elementalskill.name: Searing Onslaught
elementalskill.description: Performs forward slash that deals Pyro DMG. Can be used three times in a row.

elementalburst.name: Dawn
elementalburst.description: Creates a fiery Phoenix that crashes into enemies and causes AoE Pyro DMG before exploding. Diluc's Charge Attacks deal Pyro DMG for short time.

passivetalent2.name: Relentless
passivetalent2.description: Diluc's Charge Attack Stamina Cost decreases by 50% and duration increases 3s.

passivetalent3.name: Blessing of the Phoenix
passivetalent3.description: Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus while effect is in place.

constellations.d1: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to enemies whose HP is above 50%.
constellations.d2:
When Diluc takes DMG, his Base ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s. 
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Searing Onslaught by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4:
Casting Searing Onslaught in sequence greatly increases damage dealt. 
Within 2s of using Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for the next 2s.
constellations.d5:
Increases the level of Dawn by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6:
After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%. 
Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

profile.description:
As the wealthiest gentleman in Mondstadt, the ever-dapper Diluc always presents himself as the epitome of perfection. But behind the courteous visage burns a zealous soul that has sworn to protect Mondstadt at all costs, allowing him to mercilessly vanquish all who threaten his city.
As the city of ballads and wines, Mondstadt’s alcohol industry is renowned all over Teyvat. As the owner of the Dawn Winery, Diluc is essentially in charge of the industry. This means he has a huge stream of revenue and an entire network of information in the form of tavern patrons' gossip right at his fingertips. In a way, he is the uncrowned king of Mondstadt.

zhdescription: 坐拥蒙德大半酒业的贵公子，财力、人望、能力都令人无法小觑。

zhnormalattack.name: 淬炼之剑
zhnormalattack.description:
普通攻击：进行至多四段的连续挥砍。

重击：持续消耗体力，快速进行连续的斩击。重击结束时，会进行一次格外有力的挥砍。

zhelementalskill.name: 逆焰之刃
zhelementalskill.description: 挥舞大剑向前劈砍，造成火元素伤害。可以连续施放3次。若短时间内没有施放，则会进入冷却。

zhelementalburst.name: 黎明
zhelementalburst.description: 爆发出烈焰的力量，击退周围的敌人，造成火元素伤害。随后，将烈焰凝聚在武器上，挥出向前飞行的火之鸟，对路径上的敌人造成高额火元素伤害，并在火之鸟行进的终点爆裂造成大量的火元素范围伤害。武器上凝聚的烈焰会使迪卢克的普通攻击和重击伤害，在一段时间内转为火元素伤害。

zhpassivetalent1.name: 永不休止
zhpassivetalent1.description: 重击的体力消耗减低50%，最大持续时间增加3秒。

zhpassivetalent2.name: 熔毁之翼
zhpassivetalent2.description: 黎明提供的火元素附魔持续时间延长4秒；此外，在效果持续期间，迪卢克获得20%火元素伤害加成。

zhpassivetalent3.name: 晨曦的传统
zhpassivetalent3.description: 锻造双手剑类武器时，返还15%消耗的矿石。

zhconstellations.d1: 对生命值高于50％的敌人，迪卢克造成的伤害提高15％
zhconstellations.d2: 迪卢克受到伤害时，基础攻击力提高10％，攻击速度提高5％，持续10秒。该效果至多叠加3层。每1.5秒只能触发一次
zhconstellations.d3: 逆焰之刃的技能等级提高3级。(最高提升至15级)
zhconstellations.d4: 释放逆焰之刃的2秒后，下一段逆焰之刃的伤害提高40％，持续2秒。
zhconstellations.d5: 黎明的技能等级提高3级。(最高提升至15级)
zhconstellations.d6: 释放逆焰之刃会使接下来6秒内的2次普通攻击的攻击速度提升30％，造成伤害提高30％。此外，逆焰之刃不再会中断前两段普通攻击的连击段数。
